all your site needs

Powerful options and
features

ONE-CLICK IMPORT

You can get the entire Belfort demo content with just a single click of your mouse.

DRAG & DROP

Build and edit your pages with complete ease thanks to full Elementor compatibility.

CUSTOMIZABILITY

Belfort lets you configure every single aspect of your new site the easiest way possible.

FULLY RESPONSIVE

Designed to make your new site look & feel equally stunning on all devices and screens.

TYPOGRAPHY

Typography selection is under your complete control with over 1K Google Fonts available.

COLOR CHANGE

Modify the main website color or the color of any section and element the easy way.

PRO SUPPORT

If you ever happen to run into any questions, feel free to submit a ticket to our support.

DOCUMENTATION

Belfort also comes with a carefully compiled, comprehensive step-by-step user guide.
